name: AlcheMouse
description: Alchemist mouse is on a mission to heal the roots of an ill tree! There’s something wicked lurking in the forest. What’s that? A strange affliction, part magical, part natural. Perhaps an alchemical remedy would be of use. This looks like a job for an alchemist. AlcheMouse, to be precise! The afflicted roots are spreading the sickness. They are getting faster and faster, I need to be quick, if I want to save the forest from this malady. Run!
